mapper.sql: ID, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODCUT_NAME, OPERATOR_CODE, PROVIDER_CODE, PRO_PRODUCT_CODE, PROVINCE_CODE, ENABLE_TYPE, PRIORITY, SIZE, PRICE, DISCOUNT, PURCHASED, STATE, DESCRIPTION
mapper.select: select a.*, b.OPERATOR_NAME, c.PROVINCE_NAME, d.NAME from t_flow_product a INNER JOIN t_base_operator b ON a.OPERATOR_CODE = b.ID INNER JOIN t_base_province c ON a.PROVINCE_CODE = c.ID INNER JOIN t_flow_provider d ON a.PROVIDER_CODE = d.PROVIDER_CODE limit #{start} , #{pageSize}

select a.*, b.OPERATOR_NAME, c.PROVINCE_NAME, d.NAME from t_flow_product a INNER JOIN t_base_operator b ON a.OPERATOR_CODE = b.ID INNER JOIN t_base_province c ON a.PROVINCE_CODE = c.ID INNER JOIN t_flow_provider d ON a.PROVIDER_CODE = d.PROVIDER_CODE where a.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.*, b.OPERATOR_NAME, c.PROVINCE_NAME, d.NAME from t_flow_product a INNER JOIN t_base_operator b ON a.OPERATOR_CODE = b.ID INNER JOIN t_base_province c ON a.PROVINCE_CODE = c.ID INNER JOIN t_flow_provider d ON a.PROVIDER_CODE = d.PROVIDER_CODE where a.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_flow_product (ID, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODCUT_NAME, OPERATOR_CODE, PROVIDER_CODE, PRO_PRODUCT_CODE, PROVINCE_CODE, ENABLE_TYPE, PRIORITY, SIZE, PRICE, DISCOUNT, PURCHASED, STATE, DESCRIPTION ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodcutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proProductCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchased,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into t_flow_product
ID,
PRODUCT_CODE,
PRODCUT_NAME,
OPERATOR_CODE,
PROVIDER_CODE,
PRO_PRODUCT_CODE,
PROVINCE_CODE,
ENABLE_TYPE,
PRIORITY,
SIZE,
PRICE,
DISCOUNT,
PURCHASED,
STATE,
DESCRIPTION,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prodcutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proProductCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enableType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{purchased,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_flow_product
PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODCUT_NAME = #{prodcutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_CODE = #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_PRODUCT_CODE = #{proProductCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLE_TYPE = #{enableType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PURCHASED = #{purchased,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_flow_product set PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODCUT_NAME = #{prodcutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_CODE = #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_PRODUCT_CODE = #{proProductCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLE_TYPE = #{enableType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PURCHASED = #{purchased,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
